content:
Arpit Kumar
8445855411 | arpitchauhan.94@gmail.com | Noida

Career Objective
Eagerly seeking for an opportunity to work in a challenging environment which offers excellent learning and diversified work opportunities. I wish to be a valuable and promising employee.

Major Skills
SQL Server 2012, Stored Procedure, Function, Query Optimization, Talend

Career Profile
· I have 3 year of experience in analysis and development in Microsoft SQL sever
· Experience in creating stored procedure and function in SQL server using complex queries/subqueries/dynamic queries and other functionality of MS SQL SERVER. 
· Experience in creating database structure (ex: Table,View).
· Experience in creating indexes on table for optimization of queries.
· Experience in using transaction for achieve database property ACID.
· Worked on creating triggers on tables and used other functionality of MS SQL SERVER like .Pivot/Unpivot, CTE, Window Function.
· Experience in gathering and understanding change requirements and functional requirements.
· Effective result-oriented team player with good communication and inter-personal skills with a 
Positive attitude towards work with adherence to time schedules and quality delivery.
· Self-motivated, with ability and interest in learning new technologies and adapting quickly to new requirements and environments.
· Working on R Basics.
· Working on Talend for ETL

Educational Qualification
Bachelors of Technology from IPIT, Gajraula, Dr. A.P.J Abdul Kalam Technical University (Formerly - UPTU)

Work Experience
Smart Energy Water, Noida, May-2019 to till date
Database Engineer
(https://www.smartenergywater.com)

About Company: Smart Energy Water is Global Energy and Water Cloud Platform for Digital Customer Engagement, Mobile Workforce Engagement and Smart Analytics to the energy and utility sector. SEW provides innovative solutions that are easy to use, seamlessly integrate with utility backend systems and improve operational efficiency using AI, cloud and mobile technologies.

Project Undertaken:  
Choice Revenue Intelligence
Description: RI is the analytics software that applies the most advanced artiﬁcial intelligence (AI) techniques to detect fraud and theft in the utilities sector.

Responsibilities
· Migrate entire software to SQL server from HANA DB.
· Working on Pentaho for ETL to change the jobs for SQL Server compatible
· Working on R to make it run on SQL server as well.

Smart Customer Mobile (SCM)
Description: SCM is simplifies utility-customer interaction for a better customer experience. SCM has the user friendly interface that allows customer to conveniently manage their account and perform day to day function. It is used by customers to track their day to day usage of energy and water consumption. SCM is also used by the utilities to alert their customer during outages or to answer simple customer service inquiries.

Responsibilities
· Handling multiple clients to customize SCM.
· Working on Talend for ETL Process


Analec Infotech Pvt. Ltd., Gurgaon, Dec-2016 to Apr-2019
Software Developer (SQL)
(http://www.analec.com/)

About Company: Analec is a leading software products/CRM provider for investment research management industry. They have products like ClientManager, ResearchWise and Conference Management System that caters specifically to the stock broking and investment banking industries.

Project Undertaken:  
ClientManager
Description: ClientManager is a CRM platform that caters specifically to the stock broking and investment banking industries. It seamlessly integrates investment research, sales, trading, and sales-trading divisions at the front end of the client servicing business to deliver a superior client service experience. It adds ability to measure profitability of each individual client organization to the client service organization. ClientManager CRM suite offering arrange of integrated and easy to use client servicing tools that ensure each touch-point of the client servicing relationship – calls, emails, meetings, road shows, conference, research consumption, client feedback etc. – are not only captured but iteratively feeds the client service process. ClientManager CRM optimizes sales & trading footprint across the clients, on the basis of importance, priorities, and revenue generation potential.



Conference Management System
Description: CMS is a CRM platform that gives corporate business the necessary tools to set up, manage and deliver successful conferences. It has main modules like Conference structure which is used to manage various types of conference activities like pre/post conference tours and actual conference days, Attendees management provides one click access to conference attendees (client, corporate or internal staff) which manages attendees requirements, availability and meeting preferences. Schedule management provides flexibility to create meeting slots manually or using the Auto meeting creator which is way too intelligent to book slots automatically.

Responsibilities
· Reading and understanding the documents provided by business analysts for any change request (internal or client specific), technical analysis and verifications of use cases and detail discussion over any conflicts or understanding scenarios and live environment.
· Responsible for designing the database structure.
· Developing business logic in database using stored procedure.
· Analyze the performance of database and change the structure for optimize.
· Fixing bugs based on priority raised by testing team, understanding the scenarios of failure to insure quality work.
· Raising and pointing out any irregularities, flaws or changes required in the system or in documentation of change requests.
· Product understanding to ensure there is no functional flaws arise while development.
· Following the defined coding standards, best practices and writing clean and readable code.

Accomplishment
Earned “The Shining Star” Award for year 2017 at Analec Infotech Pvt. Ltd.

     
Personal Details
1. Name                     :  Arpit Kumar
2. D.O.B                     :  11/03/1995
3. Father's name        :  Late. Sushil Chauhan
4. Nationality              :  Indian
5. Marital status         :  Single
6. Languages             :  English , Hindi
Declaration
       I hereby declare that the above information is true and correct to the best of my knowledge.
       I bear the responsibility for the correctness of the mentioned particulars.


      Date:                                                                                                                         Arpit Kumar




	
	



3

Working on Pentaho for ETL to change the jobs for SQL Server compatible

Classification: GE Internal  
  

Curriculum Vitae  

  

Harshil Gupta  
11/46 Vikas Vihar Old Mohanpuri near AIM  

PUBLIC SCHOOL, Meerut, UP, India  

 

 +91 8077836012                                                     (e)guptaharshil31@gmail.com  
 +91 8077836012                                                                                                            

   

  

 

PROFESSIONAL SYNOPSIS  

  

 Having more than 3.9 years of working experience in SAS, SQL and Excel Macros. I am having experience 

in requirement gathering, analysis, administration and implementation of various distributed multi-tier 

systems.  

 Worked closely with clients and business team to understand requirements, doing the analysis, 

configuration and testing to generate the reports.  

 Interacting with client and end users from USA understanding the technical & functional specifications  

 Strong problem solving, analytical and Communication skills and ability to master new Technologies and 

capable of working in groups.  

  

BUSINESS SKILLS  

 

 Undertaking troubleshooting and Bug-Fixing.  

 Possesses in-depth domain knowledge of SAS, SQL and experience in onsite-offshore working model.  

 Ability to handle multiple tasks and work independently as well as in a team. Good team player with 

interpersonal skills.  

 Interacting with client and reporting.  

 Imparting training and mentoring end users.   

  

Work Experience  

  

Currently Working with Birchstreet as Data Management Specialist (April 2019-Till present)  

Prior Experience – Programmer Analyst in Wipro Limited from December 2015 – March 2019.  

 

  CORE COMPETENCIES  

  

Operating Systems    :  Windows Vista/7/10; IBM Z/OS  

 Languages       :  SAS, JCL, SQL, Excel Macros 

 RDBMS        :  Oracle 11g  

 Software        
  

:  Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint), SQL, SAS 9.2, Oracle 

  ORGANISATIONAL SCAN  

 

 

 

 

 

 

             Birch Street/GDI, Noida, India 

 

  

 Client handled: Hyatt, Marriott, Hilton 

  



  

  

 

Classification: GE Internal  
  

Team Size     :    5           

 

 Position  :    Data Management Specialist                                         Period-April 2019 - till now  
  

    Description:    Working as DMS (Data Management Specialist) in Data Management Team responsible to      

automate the business and operational processes called as procurement to pay.   

  

Responsibilities:  

 Gathering client requirements and providing reporting solutions.  

 Reviewing/Analyzing customer provided data and normalizing it using by using SAS/SQL codes 

 Analyzing production data and validating it.  

 Analyzing the expected and actual results. 

 Implementing/setting up the data as per the requirement.  

 Interacting extensively with end users on requirement gathering, analysis and documentation.  

 Clean and ensure accuracy and integrity of data. Provide support for data management activities and attend 

relevant meetings for developing, maintaining, managing, and reporting on databases and data updates. 

 Develop database functions, scripts, stored procedures, and triggers to enhance database functionality and 

security (PL/SQL) 

 Audit data on a regular basis and ensure data integrity. 

 Manage the regular report running schedule and process. 

 

Wipro Limited, Noida, India  

  

 

  

 Client handled: Boeing, Washington Education, Davita  

  

Team Size   :    11           

       Position  :    PA (Programmer Analyst)                                     Period – Dec 2015 - Mar 2019  
  

    Description:    Worked as PA in Batch Team and writing SAS/SQL codes to create reports and automate 

manual process based on client requirements. As a key member of technical shared group, developed and ran 

SAS programs to support various clients. I was responsible for creating new SAS codes, utilizing existing 

codes, and maintaining data in SAS. The project involved working with clients as well as with operations team 

to provide analysis for the population making estimation/opting for Health and welfare according to various 

pension plans available to them. The health and welfare offered to an individual are based on the analysis 

done on the requirements provided by the client. The information of the person applicable for various pension 

plans is gathered and processed for further quires as applicable according to the requirement documents.  

  

Responsibilities:  

 Gathering client requirements and providing reporting solutions.  

 Analyzing the expected and actual results.  

 Interacting extensively with end users on requirement gathering, analysis and documentation.  

 Involved with key departments to analyze areas and discuss the primary model requirements for the 

project.  

 Documented methodology, data reports and model results and communicated with the Project 

Team/Manager to share the knowledge.  

 Carried out data extraction and data manipulation using PROC SQL, PROC SORT and PROC REPORT to 

create preferred customer report as per business requirements.  

 Extensively used SAS procedures such as PRINT, REPORT, TABULATE, FREQ, MEANS, SUMMARY for 

producing ad-hoc and customized reports and external files.  

 Responsible for generating Health and welfare Reports using SAS.  

 Imported Data from relational database into SAS files per detailed specifications.  



  

  

 

Classification: GE Internal  
  

 Provided Technical/ Production Support and on-going maintenance of SAS/JCL codes.  

 Experience in interacting with operations team, technical support and help them base line the requirement 

specifications.  

 Also working with the Data Conversion team to provide the SQL queries according to the client 

requirements.   

 Also a part of the DBP (Direct Billing and Payments) team to provide the billing and payments details of the 

employee through the MS Access tool.  

 Mentored one of the new hires.  

 Also actively involved in planning and participating various floor events.  

 

QUALIFICATION  

  

  

Class/Course  School/College  Board/University  Year of Passing  

B.tech  Galgotias University  U.G.C  2015  

Intermediate  Delhi Public School Meerut  C.B.S.E  2011  

Higher Secondary  Delhi Public School Meerut  C.B.S.E  2009  

  

PERSONAL DETAILS  

   

 Name      : Harshil Gupta  
DOB, Age, Gender   : October 19, 1992, 26 years, Male.  

 Nationality      : Indian.  

Language known   : English, Hindi.

Husn Ara 

Masters in Computer Application (CSE) 

I am Enthusiastic, highly-motivated Data Science Aspirant passionate about Exposure 

to advanced analytics and machine-learning methodologies, such as Regression 

(Linear, Logistic, etc.), Cluster Analysis, CART / CHAID, Bayesian Models, and Time 

Series Analysis. I have Knowledge of visualization platforms (Tableau) and Statistical 

programming skill in Python and knowledge of analytics tools like NumPy, Pandas, 

Matplotlib, seaborn, tensorflow, keras etc. 

Worked as Dot Net Programmer with more than 6 years of experience in Asp.Net 3.5 

& 4.5, Sql Server 2012 & 2013, C#, ADO.Net etc.

PROJECTS-

1- Movie Dataset Data Cleaning project using Python 3.6 on Jupyter 

Notebook. 

2- Stock Price Prediction project using MySql. 

3- Uber Supply-Demand Gap Prediction using Python 3.6 and Tableau. 

4- Gramener Case Study for Risk Analysis of losing money while lending 

to customers.

concept.

countries for direst need of aid using Clustering & PCA concept. 

7- X Education lead scoring case study using logistic regression. 

8- House Price prediction project using advanced regression concept. 

9- Hand written Digit Recognition project using SVM concept. 

10- Telecom churn case study to reduce customer churn, telecom 

companies need to predict which customers are at high risk of churn. 

WORK EXPERIENCE 

Aug 2017- Jul 2019

· Used Control Flow Tasks and containers like For Loop Container, For Each Loop Container, Sequential Container, Execute SQL Task, FTP Task and Data Flow Task in Designing packages.
· Used data flow transformations like Merge join, Conditional Split, Union all, Pivot, Lookup, sort, Data Conversion, Derived Column, merge, aggregate, union.

· Involving creation of Cubes and Dimensions.

· Created reports by using the different types reporting items like Table, Matrix, List, Textbox, Chart and Sub reports Etc.

K-12, a term used in education and educational technology in the United States, Canada, and possibly 
other countries, is a short form for the publicly-supported school grades prior to college.

solutions that build core knowledge fully aligned to state standards and works to ensure students complete 
tests with confidence.

EPUB is an e-book file format that uses the ".epub" file extension. The term is short for electronic 
publication and is sometimes styled ePub. EPUB is supported by many e-readers, and compatible software 
is available for most smartphones, tablets, and computers.

easily design truly interactive and fully responsive educational content.

content:
MOHINI MISHRA
Mobile: + 91-8527429479                                                                                 E-Mail: mohini.mishra37@gmail.com ______________________________________________________________________________	
PROCESS DEVELOPER IN MIS REPORTING

Highly dedicated professional with 6+ years of Experience in MIS Reporting (BFSI Domain). Well-developed supervisory experience and proven ability to manage people, projects and time. Excellent in improving productivity and maintaining accuracy.  Want to Obtain a challenging leadership position by applying creative problem solving and lean management skills with a growing company to achieve optimum utilization of its resources and maximum profits.
	
	



AREAS OF EXPERTISE

· Good analytical, debugging & problem-solving skills.
· Strategies development to manage the team & work.
· Reporting as per agreed SLA.
· Interpersonal and relationship-building skills
· Decision making, Leader Skills, Exploring attitude.
· Strong management ability with experience in formulating Organization reporting policy, driving standards, and efficiency
· Ability to build trusted relationships with stakeholders and all levels of management
· Self motivated, dynamic team player assisting management team to strengthen Global reporting
· Ability to be agile in a fast paced and complex work environment including efforts to promote quality, accuracy, and accountability
· Willingness to ask questions, challenge the process and seek out answers

_________________________________________________________________________________

ACHIEVEMENTS

· Successfully Transitioned to New Processes along with the Team.
· Driving Base-lining for the new piece of work.
· Received various awards for performance and Strong support in the team
· Provided various Lean ideas for process improvement.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

DOMAIN EXPERT @ GENPACT FROM APR’13 TILL DATE

· To analyze all Operational Metrics including: - MIS data utilized for Operational Reporting -Ongoing review of actual productivity and forecast reporting - All relevant Operations reporting and Dashboards.
· Prepare Daily/Weekly/Monthly and Quarterly MIS reporting and to ensure the timeliness, accuracy and completeness of the reporting
· Diagnose data issues, with ability to identify root cause issues
· Assist in documenting/mapping new processes and procedures and revising existing procedures and processes
· Client Management - Facilitating periodic meetings with business and management to share overall status of work, resource utilization and next steps
· Training - Responsible for motivating/mentoring and grooming direct reports to offer quality deliverables to the client/business partners
· Business Knowledge - Develop an understanding of the domain/function; the individual is expected to develop domain expertise in his/her work area
· Timely partner communication and attending business calls
· Generating ad-hoc dashboards, reports and presentations  from different sources
· Leading meetings with senior managers and subject matter experts to define and gather requirements and overall objectives, to identify MIS needs and reporting output
· Define and build the necessary controls to ensure reporting integrity by comparing against source platforms
· Work to tight deadlines, and deliver an accurate product in a very aggressive schedule

PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT AND TECHNICAL PROFICIENCIES

SKILLS

· Working knowledge of Visualization tools like Tableau.
· Proficient in MS-Office applications.
· Skilled in Logistic Regression, Linear Regression, SVM, Decision Trees, Random Forest using  R, SAS, Python statistical programming languages
· Basic skills in SQL, Java, C++ and C#.

CERTIFICATIONS
			
· Lean trained, tested and certified.
· Recently completed LM1 and LM2 certification for London Market Insurance.
· Completed Genpact Data Science Pro-Degree program.
· Boot Camp certified from Insurance Institutes of America (IIA) in property and casualty insurance.

EDUCATIONAL QUALIFIATION

· Completed MCA (Master of Computer Application) from IGNOU.
· Completed B. Com from Dr. Bheem Rao Ambedkar University, Agra
· Completed GNIIT (Software Engineering) from NIIT, Delhi.
